mdRecord.dcterms:title: Student Council of UVa Nursing School
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt on photo: Student Council of University of Virginia Nursing School plans for first formal dance in new addition to McKim Hall, home for nurses. Sitting are Frances Yancey, Tallahassee, FL; First Vice President Shirley Lawrence, Charlottesville, VA; President Norma L. Close, Thomas, WV; Treasurer Jeanne Mayo, Charlottesville, VA; Jo Ann Miller, Bridgewater, VA. Standing, June Dodson, South Boston, VA; Virginia Domme, Portsmouth, VA; Louise Kuhn, Cambria, VA; Frances Rector, McLean, VA, and Second Vice President Rosalie W. Walker, Charlottesville, VA. The dance will be held Friday night, January 17th.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
